data.text: @bhttrump @pemanadik @ugyen1907 @SangayKarp @DechenwangmoM @PMBhutan attacked me a few weeks ago, so done and dusted. blocked and i cannot/do not see it's tweets. definitely someone's family or very close friend 🤣
@pemanadik @ugyen1907 @khendumdorji @SangayKarp Sir, This used to be a PDP Troll, now seems very touchy when it comes to the Large Lady. A family member, maybe? @DechenwangmoM @PMBhutan

@ugyen1907 @khendumdorji @bhttrump @SangayKarp If the NCTF has anything to say to me, they can tell me themselves. Many of the members know me personally. Don't think they need an anon to come forward on their behalf.
In any case, I have voiced my opinions against the DNT govt, not the NCTF.

@ugyen1907 @khendumdorji @pemanadik @SangayKarp Are you the mouthpiece for National Covid Task Force? Are you empowered to speak for them? Surprised, I thought they could do better, but on the other hand, it fits

The invitation goes out to you also la 
@lekeydorji
@ugyen1907 @khendumdorji @pemanadik @SangayKarp You go sit on that and rotate!
